participant_1.name: Clara
participant_1.personality: Clara is introspective and enjoys solitude, often losing herself in books. She finds joy in simple pleasures and prefers quiet weekends filled with dance rather than loud parties.
participant_1.background: i don't care about fashion. i went to school for chemistry but work in a bookstore. i hate the color orange. i dance on the weekends.

participant_2.name: Mark
participant_2.personality: Mark is family-oriented and values time spent with loved ones. He is jovial and often shares stories about his kids, reflecting his nurturing side.
participant_2.background: my wife and kids are the best. i am a plumber. i love going to the park with my three children and my wife. i have three children. my favorite ice cream flavor is chocolate.
